.. autoclass:: {{ objname }}

   {% block attributes %}

   {% if attributes %}
   .. rubric:: Attributes

   .. autosummary::
   {% for item in attributes %}
   {%- if item not in inherited_members %}
      ~{{ name }}.{{ item }}
   {%- endif %}
   {% endfor %}
   {% endif %}
   {% endblock %}

   {% block methods %}

   {% if methods %}
   .. rubric:: Methods

   .. autosummary::
   {% for item in methods %}
   {%- if item not in inherited_members %}
       ~{{ name }}.{{ item }}
   {%- endif %}
   {%- endfor %}
   {% endif %}
   {% endblock %}
